events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund. The product I got was completely different from what I purchased.
The system has classified the customer's problem as a refund request due to receiving the wrong product.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request related to the incorrect delivery.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’ll assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number so we can verify and process your refund?
I’ve attached photos of the incorrect product and my order number is 7845123. Please let me know what the next steps are.
Thank you for the information. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method and provide a prepaid label to return the item.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the refund and return shipping label offer. That works perfectly for me.
We have processed your refund and sent the shipping label via email. Please return the product at your earliest convenience.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and if you were satisfied with how your case was handled.
Yes, I got the refund and the process was smooth. Thank you for your help and prompt communication throughout.
We are closing your case now, but please reach out if you need any further assistance. Have a great day!
